attributes.action: Allow to include fees, commission and bonuses into furlough pay during covid-19
attributes.additional_details: I would love you to do this as in my opinion if employers can use up to 2500 pounds per employee, after what they are paying me for example which is 200 pounds a week it is generally forcing me to go and claim Universal Credit, tax support, housing benefit. If the commissions in some cases like restaurants in my case would be included it would change our circumstances and will allow us to pay our bills etc without going to take money from other sources which on the end of the day are one source.
attributes.background: Allow to include fees, commission and bonuses into our furlough payments during COVID-19, to total of gross income earned yearly/either within few years.
